content.prompt: The image provides the clearest evidence for which of the following features of European expansion in the early modern period?

choices.label: The spread of Christianity as a justification for the subjugation of indigenous peoples
The reliance of European colonists on indigenous peoples as sources of information about new territories
The rapid adoption of some European technologies by indigenous peoples
The creation of hybrid cultures that incorporated both European and indigenous elements

topic.text: 1.11: Causation in the Renaissance and Age of Discovery
